field.name: summary
field.value: VSNetWizards error for MRProject while Brail is selected: missing confirmation.brail

field.name: description
field.value:
trunk/Tools/VSNetWizards/CastleTemplates/VS8/CSharp/MRProject/VIewsPlaceHolder/contact/confirmation.brail is missing. Causes an error when the MRProject wizard runs with Brail as the view, since it cannot copy said file to the project directory.
To reproduce: replace RC2 Wizard files (C:\Program Files\CastleProject\Wizard Templates) with appropriate files from trunk/Tools/VSNetWizards/; (don't forget to register COM); create an MRPRoject, select Brail as your view.
workaround: (assuming RC2 default installer paths) create an empty confirmation.brail in C:\Program Files\CastleProject\Wizard Templates\VS8\CSharp\MRProject\ViewsPlaceHolder\contact. The wizard will now succeed.
file may have been missed circa rev 3986 ?
